			<script type="text/javascript">
				
				/* Get options */
				var prefs = new gadgets.Prefs();
				var options = {
					ad_client:  prefs.getString("ad_client"),
					ad_slot:    prefs.getString("ad_slot"),
					ad_width:   prefs.getString("ad_width"),
					ad_height:  prefs.getString("ad_height"),
				};
				
				/* Get http protocol */
				var https = prefs.getString("https");
				if (https == "" && document.location.protocol == "https:") {
					https = 1;
				}
				
				/* Load Event */
				var loadWindow = window.onload;
				window.onload = function() {
					loadWindow();
					loadAdSense();
				}
				
				/* Load AdSense */
				function loadAdSense() {
					alert(window.parent);
				}


			</script>
